scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ on the cross, his body pale and bleeding. To the left, the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle, stands with her hands clasped in prayer, flanked by other grieving figures. To the right, a group of soldiers, one in ornate golden armor, stand at attention, holding spears. The background features rolling blue hills and a golden sky, with distant buildings suggesting a city or town. The overall scene is one of solemnity and sorrow, capturing a pivotal moment in Christian narrative.
